column1: (select * from 02_01_District_wise_crimes_committed_against_SC_2001_2012 where district <> "TOTAL" order by Dacoity desc limit 1)
(select * from 02_01_District_wise_crimes_committed_against_SC_2001_2012 where district <> "TOTAL" order by Robbery desc limit 1)
select robbery+dacoity as tot, district from 02_01_District_wise_crimes_committed_against_SC_2001_2012 where district <> 'TOTAL' order by tot desc limit 1
select district from 02_01_District_wise_crimes_committed_against_SC_2001_2012 where murder=(select min(murder) from 02_01_District_wise_crimes_committed_against_SC_2001_2012)
